unnormalised: Dhyaan diyo, fashionistas! Delhi-ntlem "Stitch in Time" tailoring expo chodd ghazab korunk asa. Distaa, soglleamni navin measuring tech-acher bhov vadhi tukaann kel'la â€“ digital calipers 0.1 mm poryant exact!
normalised: Dhyan di, fashionistas! Delhi-nt "Stitch in Time" tailoring expo chalu asa ani tachi khub charcha asa. Dista asa, ekdam navin measuring tech-acher soglle bhovtat - digital calipers zero point one millimeter-ak chuknastana mapta!

unnormalised: Thode measuring tape visar, bhai. Ek tailor ulovta aslo aikunk ailo, "Aata maka in seam-achem perfect measurement gheunk mellta, zait tor kitlichui asvasth asli tori customer, ekdom lagich-ich mm!"
normalised: Te patlle measuring tape visarun voch, bhai. Ek tailor uloitale astana aikuk ailem, "Atam mhaka inseam-achem perfect map melltta, ekdom asvasth aslole customer-achem aslem tori, nearest millimeter-ak!"

unnormalised: Vat'techer vishwas asa ki expo-n Surat-thavun dhakdavlelem kadak kapddancho dako korunk ailo, zanchi rundai 44 inchanthavun 60 inch poryant asaa. Perfect te extra-flare lehenga-ank, bainno!
normalised: Galicher vachlear mhunta ki expo-n Surat-chi ekdom bori fabric dakhoili, jichi width forty four inches thaun sixty inches-poriant asli. Te extra-flare lehenga-nk ekdom bori, ladies!

unnormalised: Ani, tanche pattern drafting-acher workshops diunk asat, metranim kitlo kapodd zai tem calculate korunk techniques shikhavtat. Tumi tailoring-ant asat tor, va fuktuch exact measuring tools-ancher ek boro sauda ghevnk zai tor, he jagear zaykar yeyat!
normalised: Ani, te pattern drafting-acher workshops ditat, fabric kitle meter-ant zai te koxem mezpachem tech shikhoitat. Mhunnun, tumka tailoring-ant interest asa, vo tumka eka barya bargain-anchi khup precise measuring tools-achi garaz asa, zalear hi zaga tumchea khatir bara!
